actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 501 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax exemption for an association operated exclusively to provide workmen's compensation for State and local employees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to qualify associations which are operated to provide workmen's compensation for State and local government employees as tax exempt organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 501 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide tax exemption for an association operated exclusively to provide workmen's compensation for State and local employees.
